meanings.definition: A single-celled organism that is classified as a member of the kingdom Protista.
meanings.sent1: Protozoons are tiny creatures that live alone and belong to the Protista group.
meanings.sent2: In the pond, you can see protozoons swimming around under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The protozoons in the drop of water seemed to be having a party all by themselves.
meanings.sent4: Under the lens, the protozoons appeared like tiny kings ruling their microscopic kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The teacher showed us a slide with colorful protozoons moving gracefully in their world.

meanings.definition: A type of microscopic organism that can be found in water and soil.
meanings.sent1: We observed protozoons in the soil sample collected from the garden.
meanings.sent2: The scientist discovered new species of protozoons thriving in the lake water.
meanings.sent3: The protozoons in the puddle seemed to be playing hide and seek with each other.
meanings.sent4: The soil was teeming with protozoons, like a bustling city in miniature.
meanings.sent5: The children marveled at the diversity of colors among the tiny protozoons in the microscope slide.
